column3:
“First, let me state that I am very picky in what strains I medicate with.  I have tried all kinds of strains and am very specific in the effects I want to feel.  I need cannabis to 1) Calm my stomach/intestines immediately and take away nausea - and - 2) Provide me with a clear, manageable high that does NOT induce paranoia or anxiety.  

I have severe IBS, GERD and a host of other intestinal issues, so a high CBD ...”
“New favorite. Energy and creativity with chill. Think of red bull mixed with slowjams.”

“I've been looking forward to trying Green Crack for a while, but they had Green Queen so I got it instead. Oowee, I'm not disappointed! This strain is a strange taste experience... What starts off as an earthy floral turns into hints of blueberry and pine, the fuck? Beautiful crystals all over light green buds, this stuff speeds up the mind and smiles up the face. Great for wake n bakes, pre-party joints, and ice in ...”
“A bit like Green Crack, but more mellow. Wakes you up, increases focus, but isn't as tense.”
“Eyeballed it" instead of using my scale
column4: and apparently had a fair amount more than usual last night.  I still had a good experience
column5: and still felt quick to relax muscles and do a lot of range-of-motion stretching
column6: but I also felt much more mentally affected (kind of stupor-ish) and kind of agitated.  I spent much of the first hour and a half unable to sit still for very long
column7: and noticed I was pacing around a lot

column3: “Worthy of its name, though heavy hitters will probably need two and a half bowls, it is pleasantly fragrant in smell and taste. Long lasting effect of up to three hours.”
“tons of crystals and tasted great. hit very very smooth”

“One of my favorites I've found so far, not top shelf but definitely worth the price!  The high is very floaty and relaxing, probably from the space queen, yet very euphoric and happy from the green crack.  You can definitely tell its a hybrid, though I would say it's more of a head high than a body high.  Very versatile strain, I've had crazy party nights on this and very relaxing, enjoyable, nights in with friends o...”

“Nice, Fun, Quick Buzz. Gotta pack a few bowls to get a long buzz other than that you come down pretty quick. Tingly feeling is a sure thing and no Paranoia. Leaves a crappy taste in your mouth but Arizona Green Tea always fixes that. I suggest you always have a glass when u smoke this one. 
Lastly, IDK if this was due to a perfect grind and pack but one bowl just would not end.!!”
“This strain is great for energy and pain control. Really helps with muscle spasm pain.”

“Green Queen is dope. I've gotten a tolerance over the years so I always look for indicas. Usually because of its ability to knock out anxiety. But this Green Queen though is good. Good for energy,video games, school work. Definitely focused right now.”

“An Indica dominant hybrid with an appealing tropical fruit scent and tastes great as well. Delivers a great body high, and a sleepy euphoria that is not at all overpowering. Also delivers a fair amount of pain relief and is great for insomnia as a night time toke 1-3 hours before sleep.”

“I picked an ounce of Green Queen not to long ago from collective awakenings.  This was my first time trying this strain, and I was not disappointed.  Its one of the better strains Ive ever encountered.  I felt happy, euphoric, and relaxed but not lazy.  I will definitely be back for more.”

“Green Queen is AMAZING! Great for wake and bake, customer service, and before bed time. I recommend GREEN QUEEN if you are spending a night out with a lady. Thank you Portland, OR dispensaries for the GREEN QUEEN!”
“great strain genetics are correct but all other information is wrong.”

“Green Queen is very good hybrid perfect Pts strain the space queen cross provides clearness with a jolt from the green candy.Helps provide clear clean high.Smell of white wine, pine, apple, woody.Taste white wine pine woody spicy.Effect clear balanced high. OG Gardens Oregon.”
“great strain genetics are correct but all other information is wrong.”

“Green Queen is very good hybrid perfect Pts strain the space queen cross provides clearness with a jolt from the green candy.Helps provide clear clean high.Smell of white wine, pine, apple, woody.Taste white wine pine woody spicy.Effect clear balanced high. OG Gardens Oregon.”
“This is a really all around feel good strain, very rare.”
“Good, dense nugs, very earthy/chocolatey smell. Vapor was bittersweet and tasted a bit like tea. Good uplifting high, good for doing work/daily activities.”
“You will get stuff done quickly and efficiently monotonous tasks are done in a breeze and complex tasks are just obstacles to power through”

“✨I'm surprised that the most recent reviews of this strain are years old. It makes me wonder if I got lucky when I tried it recently. 🤔 I tried it based on a delightful 👩🏻 bud tender's recommendation (shout out to High Desert Healing). As of now it's only available at one local place... good to know. I tried a gram of it and really enjoyed the uplifting effects. Very creative vibes, and gives you energy. Smells ve...”

“Green Queen taste like a jolly rancher or cotton candy, wow this is SO delicious I love it. I've had it about four different times now and I always pick it over anything else. It's so damn tasty I can't repeat it enough. It even smells great when someone else exhales. The high is strong at first and then it creeps down your toes like a flood of warm water and then your riding a surf board out of a wave tunnel, you'll...”

“Migraine pain 6; nausea 6 when I medicated round 0930 or so. Takes bout 5 min to start workin. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (a must for me). Body high saved my @$$. Head high energetic. Think I had too much tho; bit of couch lock. Body high lasted over 3 hours. Still stoned @ 1400. Wow, love me good daytime meds. Definitely on my fav list; highly recommend for daytime use for pain/nausea. :-)”

“Green Queen taste like a jolly rancher or cotton candy, wow this is SO delicious I love it. I've had it about four different times now and I always pick it over anything else. It's so damn tasty I can't repeat it enough. It even smells great when someone else exhales. The high is strong at first and then it creeps down your toes like a flood of warm water and then your riding a surf board out of a wave tunnel, you'll...”

“A very clear-headed high, definitely a boost in physical energy. Makes you want to get up and go, perfect strain for hiking or just being outdoors in general. No paranoia or anxiety which is very important for me.

Smell is great and the taste is even better!

It's a very potent strain, definitely for veteran smokers. If you're a newbie- take a few rips and wait.

My favorite hybrid strain.”

“if you don't know what to get, always buy artizencannabis. no waste of a high or money.
Greenstudiosolutions review :
Green queen opening: smells like victory. ...
Effects : A feel of good positive mind with the relaxation of the body.
Overall feeling : relaxed yet still focused to conquer my next task. uplifted and can enjoy music like never before.”
“You will get stuff done quickly and efficiently monotonous tasks are done in a breeze and complex tasks are just obstacles to power through”

“✨I'm surprised that the most recent reviews of this strain are years old. It makes me wonder if I got lucky when I tried it recently. 🤔 I tried it based on a delightful 👩🏻 bud tender's recommendation (shout out to High Desert Healing). As of now it's only available at one local place... good to know. I tried a gram of it and really enjoyed the uplifting effects. Very creative vibes, and gives you energy. Smells ve...”
“I'm thinking maybe I got a not so green" Green Queen. I experienced a more calm effect than most seem to report. It was uplifting and creative
column4: but alternately mellow? I expected a more energetic effect. This may be a useless review seeing how it differs from most commonly reported effects
column5: but just wanted to throw my $.02 in.”"

column3: “I got 3.5 grams of Green Queen produced by Artizen and it was beautiful!!!! The batch I got only tested at 19.9% total cannabinoids but flourished with potent terpenes &had a great high. This sativa gave me a nice spacey cerebral high, a boost of motivation &feeling good. This flower made great memories with me.”
“The small mostly compact buds makes a great J. Uplifting high helps dull the chronic pain to a small tingling, while at the same time giving me enough energy to focus on projects clearly.”
“fun!”

“I grew her from a clone a few years back. I grew blue dream next to her and survey says..... Green queen wins that Pepsi challenge! Very euphoric and non drowsy. My anxiety fades away and am able to focus on tasks. I only hope it becomes more available.”
“Very Fruity indeed, and the smell has a very nice touch to it! Gives you a nice body high sometimes or head high too but overall a great herb!”

“Taste: Like a tropical fruit jolly rancher, wow this is SO delicious I love it.  I’ve had it about five different times now and each time it gets better.  I can’t wait to have more of it in the future.  It’s so sweet n’ tasty I can’t stress or repeat it enough.  Some of the additional flavors are an interesting complex mixture of sweet rich earth and a hint of spice and everything nice.

Buzz Type: The high is stro...”
“Yum Yum I love it and my friend is wearing his sun glasses inside and I'm super ripped up now too!”
“Wide awake, but not much focus. Left me feeling a bit scatterbrained.”

“I love Green Crack, and its aroma, and Green Queen is just as good if not better. I'm so impressed that with a single hit every 4 hours, I have a pain-free, happy day, with no side effects other than the munchies. Yeah, I'm gonna gain weight on this one. Wicked munchies. Drops my blood pressure, too. A sweet high without the jitters. I'll keep this one in my rotation for a long time.”

“Definitely what you want in a hybrid, as it seems to have aspects of both a sativa and an indica. the different aspects of the high seem to come in waves. Starts with an uplifted feeling, and a head buzz. Very mild body buzz that only seems noticeable when youre not being active. Then come the giggles, and the munchies. Damn this strain makes me eat. Great for listening to music, or dancing. On the comedown i got pre...”
“great high. 😎”

“Quite a unique strain. Woody, earthy, somewhat floral notes are pleasant but cause quite a ruckus. Surprisingly sweet, and fruity notes come out once the bud has had a chance to breathe. Apricots, and plum.

From afar this strain might appear dullish, but closer inspection reveals an attractive olive green, with an even carpet of orange hairs. 

The interesting linage of this plant leads to some equally interesting r...”

“Migraine pain mild; nausea 7-8 when I medicated round 0930 or so. Takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (absolute must for me). Body high allowed me to eat breakfast & clean house. Head high was energetic, social & focused. Love me good worker buds! Worked wonders for my anxiety as well. One of my favs for sure. Could see how this' be a good sleeper for newbies. But my tolerance is ...”
“Very good at relieving gastrointestinal pain. Happy and euphoric.”

“I love this strain because of the energy and concentration it give me after smoking it.  Listed as a hybrid, this is a big-boy sativa in my opinion.  Green Queen has become part of my gym workout routine. Smoke, drive to the gym and ready to go.  Mind and body both dialed in with an energized buzz.  Music sounds 3-D and hits my mind deep as my body feels every rep and my muscles can literally feel the energy the Gree...”
“Yum Yum I love it and my friend is wearing his sun glasses inside and I'm super ripped up now too!”

“With a blend of light and dark emerald colors and a sweet earthy smell Green Queen is a true beauty.  It delivers an energetic, focused experience that is balanced out with a very nice light to moderate body buzz.  Good for anytime really but it may not be the best choice for those questing for insomnia relief.”

“I've only tried half a dozen or so strains in the past couple of months (since I started using again, authorized by my naturopath) but this is by far my hands-down best choice for muscle spasms and chronic pain.  I love this stuff: it's strong but not overwhelming, deeply relaxing without making me feel comatose, and still leaves me feeling functional for everyday tasks (though I wouldn't want to drive or operating a...”

“I'm pretty new to marijuana, but out my of limited experience this a great strain. Pretty good body high, any aches and pains are immediately soothed, and and overall feeling of calmness make this a great for strain to relax at the end of the day.”

“With a blend of light and dark emerald colors and a sweet earthy smell Green Queen is a true beauty.  It delivers an energetic, focused experience that is balanced out with a very nice light to moderate body buzz.  Good for anytime really but it may not be the best choice for those questing for insomnia relief.”

“I love this strain because of the energy and concentration it give me after smoking it.  Listed as a hybrid, this is a big-boy sativa in my opinion.  Green Queen has become part of my gym workout routine. Smoke, drive to the gym and ready to go.  Mind and body both dialed in with an energized buzz.  Music sounds 3-D and hits my mind deep as my body feels every rep and my muscles can literally feel the energy the Gree...”

“This one surprised me little bit! Before I purchase anything I always come to LEAFY to see the reviews! One guy said there was a lot of stalk, yes there is a little more than usual! However it is over shadowed by this hybrid power! I have never had either Green Crack or Space Queen and this is a hybrid of those 2 legends! This one is a little hard to find so I went with the full OZ! Not disappointed I did either'”

“Great balance of Sativa up with relax. A perfect in between for me. Very happy, uplifted and relaxed. Everyone loves this one. Tasty and smells fruity. Can be good for bed or just an after work wind down.”

“A thoughtful process of elimination has led me to use this strain exclusively, to help relieve chronic muscle spasms and arthritis pain.  I consistently notice physical relaxation, and an overall feeling of groundedness and connection to my body, and I am deeply thankful for this given my situation.  After medicating with this strain, mentally and emotionally I consistently feel more calm, increased appreciation of m...”

“One of my favorites.  Uplifting mood-improver.  Strong sativas tend to make me a little paranoid, but I experienced none of that with this sativa-dominant hybrid.  This isn't a brain-bending, stupor-inducing high; instead it's a nice, balanced, conversational experience that provides some serious zzzzz's on the comedown.”

“Clear head with mid-level intoxication, but also good for night time use.  Can be a little couch locky, and also extreme munchies.  Very good high lasting all night from only a couple hits.  Not for beginners!”

“Clear head with mid-level intoxication, but also good for night time use.  Can be a little couch locky, and also extreme munchies.  Very good high lasting all night from only a couple hits.  Not for beginners!”

“Love it!! I am full of energy and focus. I suffer from Migraines, nerve damage and mental illnesses.
I got so much done. I either get light munchies or no need to even eat. Head high that sneaks up. Taste like smoking the scent of dirt after a good rain.”

“This strain is sticky. This strain is painful in your lungs. This strain will FUCK. YOU. UP. 

And it tastes, looks and smells beautiful.”
“This was some of the best tasting stuff I have had in years, it looked great, bright green and pretty much blew my socks off.  One of my favorites for sure.”

“One of my favorites.  Uplifting mood-improver.  Strong sativas tend to make me a little paranoid, but I experienced none of that with this sativa-dominant hybrid.  This isn't a brain-bending, stupor-inducing high; instead it's a nice, balanced, conversational experience that provides some serious zzzzz's on the comedown.”
“Very Fruity indeed, and the smell has a very nice touch to it! Gives you a nice body high sometimes or head high too but overall a great herb!”
“Yum Yum I love it and my friend is wearing his sun glasses inside and I'm super ripped up now too!”
“Most euphoric strain I have ever smoked.”

“Taste: Like a tropical fruit jolly rancher, wow this is SO delicious I love it.  I’ve had it about five different times now and each time it gets better.  I can’t wait to have more of it in the future.  It’s so sweet n’ tasty I can’t stress or repeat it enough.  Some of the additional flavors are an interesting complex mixture of sweet rich earth and a hint of spice and everything nice.

Buzz Type: The high is stro...”
“This is a different kind of high for me.  I don't know if I've ever felt this.  I think this is my first good Head High".  Success!”"

“Very strong and nearly immediate high. Asked for the highest THC they had and was given this and Romulan, and they're both right on the money. Green Queen seems to hit me in waves - regular spacey high, then bored/restless, then too sleepy to keep eyes open but unable to sleep, then starving. A very small amount goes a long way, especially compared to some of the recent strains I've tried.  This is definitely a new f...”

“Excellent feel good, happy high. The type of high you would want when you are baking cookies with your kids - removes all irritability but keeps you present and connected. The high is not strong and does not last long, maybe 1 to 2 hours for me.”
“I was pretty pumped to try this strain but let down hard the high was average but the taste was less than pleasant”

“Sitting here with the roomies so hungover at our new crib and this is just what we needed to get our day goin. Wait, we are a little lazy but happy about the day! Feelin hungry with dry mouth for sure. Love it though.”
“The Anxiousness is definitely dominant and i feel cheerful with bursts of energy and creativity.  Drink plenty of water while using.”
“Awesome strain.  Body high on a thousand. My new favorite.”

“This strain made me very happy. I looked at myself in the mirror, smiled, and felt grateful for everything I have. A good job, good family and friends, and best of all - a good eighth of weed on me :)”

“Migraine pain 6; nausea 7 when I medicated round 1700 or so. Takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (an absolute must for me). Body high allowed me to eat dinner & clean a lil. Head high energetic & social, very nice. High jus now startin to come down 2 + hours lata. Highly recommend for daytime use for pain/nausea/anxiety! One of my favs for sure! Top shelf meds!”
“great bud.  made me want to stretch out and release the day!”
“Of all the tree I've burned, this is by far the best hybrid strain. The high is beautiful and leaves no fatigue at all!!!”
“Green Crack x Space Queen makes for a very tasty, very lime-flavored, and very skunky bud. The high is great, uplifting, and the smoke is light, however very aromatic and skunky.”

“Green Queen is a tasty and powerful plant. While growing the flowers had a smell of ripe melons, which matured into a sweet grapefruit/citrus(wife says cat-piss) smell after cure.  The high is functional and stimulating, and yet has a relaxing nature without being tiring, perfect for all day and into a active evening. She was ready outdoors here in Southern Oregon @ October 5-10, so she beat the mold season. She was ...”
“Absolutely one of my favorite strains. I was already a fan of Green Crack and Space Queen, so when I saw this strain from Soulshine Cannabis, I had to try it. I was not disappointed!”
“I loved the vibes of Green Queen and have been unable to find it in NYC”
“Super strong. Promises for a good time and lots of giggles!”
“It was amazing!”
“-BBB-”
“nice strain!😌🍁💨🔥”

“GRAPEFRUIT

(9/10)”

“New to the site so please excuse the short review. I'm still getting used to this.

Nice high from 2-3 bong rips. Didn't feel lethargic but did feel pain relief.

From my dispensary's website: This strain is a cross between Martian Mean Green and Space Queen. It has a slightly fruity odor. When smoked it has a smooth fruity earthy flavor. most patients experience both physical and cerebral intoxication. Excellent...”

“Great High!!!
First time using this strain and wow I am impressed. SUPER smooth. Very milky and so so smooth. The high was happy, talkative, energetic. Extremely stony but not lazy high at all. Great for a social meet up and just chillin as well. Overall great strain. I will be buying this every chance i get.”

“I picked up the last cartridge of Green Queen by Select Strains at my dispensary today. It was a bit leaky, and now the vape pen keeps blinking even though it's charged. Grrr.  Luckily my other herb vape pen base is working, so I did get high on this today, and it is a really good one.  It tastes like citrussy pine and it kicked me in the pants!  I felt like I had kissed a Douglas Fir tree!  Mine tested at 75.49%  TH...”
“Its my new favorite strain its effects were quick and cerebral I felt kind of edgy”
“Only downside is that it'll make you sleepy on the comedown.”

“2 top shelf strains combined , need another shelf.  great body high and leaves you in a way where you can still get things done.   great smells makes a wicked joint. GREAT breakfast.

no this review was not done by Tony the Tiger

its just GREAT !”
“I love vaping this, it's like a grapefruit half in the taste.”

“when smoked it has a harsh smoke that makes you cough but when the woody tasting coughing is over it leaves a sweet menthol berry flavor in your mouth. hits you hard and is an amzing high that effects every part of your body. great hybrid.”

“I expected a lot more from this strain.. Its a middle of the road hybrid nothing special.. Mild energy, mild creativity, no stoney effects at all. Felt more like a sativa than hybrid to me but still a weaker one.”

“You go along for a while using the same strain, and think you're starting to understand the varietal you're using and how it balances out between relieving symptoms and interfering with ordinary functioning, and then you discover it can still surprise you.  Green Queen has been the only strain in my stash for weeks.  I had my usual small pipe bowl of this at around 7 pm; by 8:00 I'd eaten twice as much dinner as I'd ...”

“A little bit of this strain goes a long way. Even for veteran smokers. More on the sativa side and can easily be overdone. Has a paranoid effect but also a nice cerebral buzz at the same time. Great for day use.”
“This strain has a quick energy high with undertones of relaxation. Very good for cleaning or exercising.”
“Amazing strain! I am a long time smoker and have a high tolerance, not too many strains can get me feeling it in a few hits like green queen. this is definitely in my top five strains of all time!”

“Migraine pain mild; nausea 8 when I medicated round 1030 or 1100. Takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (an absolute must for me). Body high allowed me to eat a decent breakfast. Head high allowed me to start my day which this morning was very difficult. High lasted 3 + hours which was awesome for a Sativa dominant. Still one of my favs! Highly recommend for daytime use for pain/nau...”
“Fun and up-lifting. A lighter taste but a good buzz for staying active and especially for rolling joints.”
“Look the look it mimics green crack but the taste is woody n sweet the smell is fruity head n body high so far smooth smoke very relaxing 😎 would try again”

“Green queen is my go to when I need to be productive. This is the most productive strain I've used with the least amount of anxiety. Can also be very giggly. I've been told that it's the Space Queen portion of this strain that gives it the happy giggle feel, but I've yet to duplicate that with any other strains.”

“Very Nice!! Super relaxing with a fantastic mood lift, Perfect!! Its exactly why I love Hybrid's, and the pain relief from this strain is so soothing. So glad I found this great Queen, If I have a chance to purchase this again, Well, put me in Checkmate!!”

“For the record, this is a joint review on some GQ wax and some GQ crossed with NYPD...  Both are #GreeleyGallery in-house awesomeness.

Great smell and taste... like coconut lemongrass (which is only so specific because my wife has a soap which smells exactly the same).  Strong affect; fairly chill without difficulty focusing.  Not feeling super motivated and... (giggle) definitely looking forward... (giggle) to dinn...”
“I love the flavor! I had some years ago, and it still smells and tastes the same.”

“Its very green & tasty. I thought the high would be stronger.  I smoked more than my usual amount trying to achieve a high that I didnt really come across.  I was surprized to see its parent strains which both are 2 of my favorites.  I had to review Green Queen because I love it's name 💚”

“Strong taste similar to what others have mentioned. This Indica dominated Hybrid has a solid, thick euphoric high that onsets quickly and comes down slowly (~80min). Take care to not over medicate and send yourself to the couch..”
“it's an OK buzz but the stem within the buds are thick. you end up with more lumber and less bud making it effectively a higher cost buzz.”
“It got me high when others failed. Heady behind the eyes but not tired, type of high. Talkative and philosophical, but not necessarily the most linear ideas when smoking this.”
“Hands down the best Sativa-focused hybrid I've tried.”

“Migraine pain comin back; nausea 6 when I medicated round 1900 or 1930. Takes bout 5-10 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. Head high strong but nice. No anxiety/paranoia (a must for me). Body high what I needed. Seemed to lose track of time tho. I wanted to get so much done today & now it's time to go to bed. I think that's a natural side effect of medicating. ;-) Slowed down a lil bit which is not what I wanted...”

“Not sure if i just got the bottom of the barrel, I only 2 gm, but this was not what I expected.  I have had Epic Green Queen and it was one of my favorites.  This was stringy, burned fast, did not taste good, or do the trick medically.”

“One of my favorite strains!  Gives a wonderful body buzz without making you sleepy AT ALL.  Very relaxing for muscles; I love it for treating my pain.  The buzz can get pretty strong in your head if you have a lot of it, so I tend to stick to small amounts.”

“My experience with this strain has been great, it's very effective in managing my pain and muscle spasms specifically.  I also felt a mild, but pleasant head buzz which gave me a little extra energy.  Amazing pain fighter for those looking to still be productive and focused after use.”
“mild.”
“Good balance of body and mind high. Good for being active yet chill. Big smokers should probably load large bowls.”

“Picked this up from my favorite dispensary The Healing Leaf Collective, and am loving it. Very nice, mellow...bit of a creeper..helps my back pain, like a muscle relaxer would, but i am able to move around and complete daily things...”

“Green queen is the fucking fire. Strongest stench when u open the bag of a sour, pungent, diesely, cheesey type smell. The nugs are light greenish-gold, sparkling with what looks like little  droplets of thc crystals. Sorta fluffy buds but tight buds, compacted together and sticky as fuckkk. Looks to good to even smoke. Now the taste is a high of its own, it's got. Really pungent diesely sour diesel kinda taste. With...”
“nice very free”
“favorite strain. Quick effects. very uplifting and energizing”
“queen green was a nice high but gave me cold sweat”

“I experienced this strain in oil form. I got a vape cartridge of it from a dispensary in Washington. I don't remember a great deal of detail from back then, suffice to say that I bought it along with oil vape cartridges of 3 or 4 other strains including Maui Wowie, and I distinctly remember the Green Queen was my favorite by a mile.”

“Still my hands-down favorite.  I'm trying to use up the other strains I have in my stash, so I have an excuse to use GQ and Romulan exclusively -- both are the best I''ve tried for muscle spasm and arthritis pain.  Green Queen is my med of choice if I need physical help and still want/need to be able to interact with the rest of the world.  (Wouldn't want to be driving for at least two hours after medicating regardle...”
“Not a good stand by. Slight feeling of chest pain and feeling of full (uncomfortably full) all night.”
“Comes on slowly, but then provides a rounded heady high, still allowing you to function in public and keep conversations going. High dissipates a little more quickly than normal.”
“Green Queen has been in my stash more than once and it is a great overall bud to get a good balance of mental and physical effects.”
“a good day strain”

“Great flavor! Kind of a creeper stone. Great colors, lime greens red to orange hairs. Smells good, looks good, tastes good. Got this strain from artizen at world of weed in Tacoma wa. I recommend trying it out.”
“One word...energy”
“All hail the queen!... if Beyonce loved you.”
“Great smell and taste! A fantastic Hybrid”
“Good smoke great smell. At 24% I was expecting an intense headfuck high. Instead I had a mood relaxing high. Great product from Artizen. Just didn't have that extra power to hit the 5 star...”

“This is a good strain for going inward and creating. I've written and strategized a lot with success. It is NOT good for hiking or anything requiring balance. I went hiking on this the whole time was paranoid of falling down the steep mountain. 😑”

“This is my Oregon staple. Everything I see is compared to this strain and its a big deal when I find something that's comparable! I have never found anything else that's this quality and available frequently.... It has a very nice high that's easily controllable by amount. As a hybrid it seems to have a little bit of every effect but for those with migraines and/or anxiety this wouldn't be the best stain, though wort...”

“When I buy weed I usually go for a full sativa as I come down sorta quickly and usually get tired with indica.  However this does not cause me to get tired but still offers a body high.  The combination is extremely relaxing but it also excites your mind with ideas.”

“holy hell. So my cousin got this for me, and as always i smelled it. it had a very earthy and woody smell, and it felt like a solid, sticky nug. i really liked it so i packed it in my pipe. i hit that shit and holy fuck. it has a very nice numbing sensation on the bridge of your nose. then it spreads to behind your eyes. i was a bit paranoid, and had cotton mouth like a mother, but it was a very enjoyable weed! nice ...”
“Space queen is one of my absolute favs and green crack is a really nice cross breed. Like the reviews before me, the high is up lifting, the buds are sticky dense with a delicious woody scent.”
“Amazing strain. I got this a while back and fell in love with it. Doesn't give me the munchies, nice head high while still relaxing the body. Good afternoon or nearing bedtime smoke.”
“I just picked up a zip of this for 150 from my boy and the tricombes and crystals on this shit is crazy. It's a really chill and motivating high so have fun niggas”
“Made me a little anxious. Feels good otherwise, though.”
“One hit and I was spacy, but pretty lazy.  Not good if you have stuff to do.  Flavor is a little diesel-y" on the inhale.  Smell is unique... can't quite place it.”"
